meanings.definition: The act or process of making something smaller in size.
meanings.sent1: The miniaturizations of the model cars impressed everyone at the exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The artist's miniaturizations of famous landmarks were displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturizations of the toy animals made them look like they belonged in a tiny zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her collection showcased the miniaturizations of historical buildings in intricate detail.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturizations of the furniture in the dollhouse were so realistic.

meanings.definition: The result of making something smaller in size.
meanings.sent1: The miniaturizations of the technology allowed for more compact devices.
meanings.sent2: The miniaturizations of the artwork were admired for their attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The miniaturizations of the cupcakes made them irresistible to the party guests.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with miniaturizations of famous landmarks, creating a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The miniaturizations of the plants in the terrarium created a beautiful miniature garden.
